MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L15  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Strathcona Road, Macdonald Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.43pm. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.05pm on 4th of Nov 2020
